/usr/bin/c++    -rdynamic CMakeFiles/tower.dir/src/GL/opengl_interface.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tower.dir/src/img/image.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tower.dir/src/aircraft.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tower.dir/src/tower_sim.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tower.dir/src/tower.cpp.o CMakeFiles/tower.dir/src/main.cpp.o  -o tower  -lglut -lOpenGL -lGLX -lGLU
